item.title: tomcat
item.description: 是什么 The Apache Tomcat® software is an open source implementation of the Java Servlet, JavaServer Pages, Java Expression Language and Java WebSocket technologies. The Java Servlet, JavaServer Pages, Java Expression Language and Java WebSocket specifications are developed under the Java Community Process. Servlet Spec JSP Spec EL Spec WebSocket Spec JASPIC Spec Apache Tomcat Version Latest Released Version Supported Java Versions 4.0

item.title: Maven
item.description: 是什么 Apache Maven is a software project management and comprehension tool. Based on the concept of a project object model (POM), Maven can manage a project’s build, reporting and documentation from a central piece of information. https://maven.apache.org/ 使用 下载 https://maven.apache.org/download.cgi 安装 (windows) 前提 jdk 添加环境变量 MAVEN_HOME=**\apache-maven-3.6.1\ PATH=;%MAVEN_HOME%\bin 修改配置文件 **\apache-maven-3.6.1\conf\settings.xml 1 2 3 4 5
